name: Party Bots
description:
Every match in Party Bots is a new challenge because everything is random! Survive on your platform while random things happen all around you. Anything can happen, and you have to adapt to survive the experiment!



Party Bots supports up to 100 players in each lobby! Although, the use of powerful gaming computers is recommended in this case!



You start as a regular Y-Bot, but you don't have to look like everyone else! Customize your face, color, and hat to your heart's content!



Explosions and lasers can destroy platforms in a dynamic and fun way!



Everything around you can change in an instant! Did the lava turn into water? Why is there a mine on my platform? Can crates swim? You never know what will happen next!



Party Bots is all about surviving random events! Events can happen to you, your platform, or globally for everyone! The events can change platform sizes, make players go fast, convert your platform to wood, and much more. There are over 60 events right now, and more may be added!



Party Bots is full of new items to unlock. Are you lucky enough to get a really rare one?



You can take control of game modes yourself and change everything to your liking! Don't like the explosive barrels? Remove them! Want things to happen faster? Speed up the events! Is the game too easy for you? Make it harder!



This can save you in the most dangerous situations, or just be fun!
